title: Shauna Arnold | Developer & Designer
description: Freelance developer, designer and project manager currently based in Hawaii.

home.title: Hi! I'm Shauna
home.description: I am a freelance designer and developer focusing on React, PHP and Rails. I have a background in project management overseeing large brand development and marketing projects with clients such as Nike, Apple, Nordstrom, the MLB and the NFL, among many others. Contact me today to see how I might be able to bring my expertise to your business.
